entry.title: gitdagray/react_redux_toolkit
entry.summary:
"React Redux Toolkit for Beginners"

?? Chapters

Author Links

ğŸ‘‹ Hello, I'm Dave Gray.

âœ… Check out my YouTube Channel with all of my tutorials.

ğŸš© Subscribe to my channel

â˜• Buy Me A Coffee

ğŸš€ Follow Me:

  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • Blog
  • Reddit

Description

ğŸ“º YouTube Playlist for this repository.

ğŸš€ This repository shares ALL of the resources referenced during the React Redux Toolkit tutorial series.

âœ¨ Based on the "Redux Essentials" tutorial in the official Redux Toolkit docs by Mark Erikson with some project additions and modifications along the way.

ğŸ“ Academic Honesty

DO NOT COPY FOR AN ASSIGNMENT - Avoid plagiargism and adhere to the spirit of this Academic Honesty Policy.

ğŸ“š Redux References

  • ğŸ”— Official Site for Redux Toolkit
  • ğŸ”— Redux Devtools
  • ğŸ”— Immer.js

ğŸ“š React Router References

  • ğŸ”— Official Site for React Router
  • ğŸ”— React Router v6 Tutorial

  • ğŸ”— ES7 React JS Snippets Extension
  • ğŸ”— Prettier VS Code Extension
  • ğŸ”— vscode-icons VS Code Extension
  • ğŸ”— Github Themes VS Code Extension

ğŸ’» Source Code

  • ğŸ”— Chapter 1 - Intro to Redux
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 2 Starter Code - Example Project
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 2 Completed Code - Example Project
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 3 Starter Code - Async Thunks
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 3 Completed Code - Async Thunks
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 4 Starter Code - Blog Project
  • ğŸ”— Chapter 4 Completed Code - Blog Project

  • ğŸ”— Chapter 5 Completed Code - Performance

  • ğŸ”— Chapter 7 Starter Code - Advanced Redux Blog
